content: One of the most interesting game (can one call it a game thoug? Experience is much mocre appropriate word) on a mobile in recent years. Thabk you for creating aucb a fantastic little friend for us.

This is an excellent app which was fun to use and left me thinking all day. I found myself waiting to visit Stanley until I could give his tasks the proper time and attention. At first the wait between activities seemed too long but I think the pacing is about right.

Battery drain when sleeping, it used 40% overnight and my alarm didnt work due to device being dead, app is the culprit according to Samsung's built in monitor. This whole "come back the next day/later" is a ploy to prevent you from refunding the purchase right away. Great if you want to see creator names every time you open the game, I guess these will be important names and we must see them few times a day. The whole bird experience falls flat fast. Money grab and wasted opportunity.
Wonderful writing and a wonderful bird friend make this game worth every cent. I love it! also I cried when my bird asked me how i was doing and consoled me when I had a bad day, 10/10 game.

I absolutely loved this experience. I feel like the team really captured the feel of a parrot. The noises, the movements, even the pining of the bird's eyes made me think of my life with parrots. The bird is charming and I like that they need time to think so you're only doing a few things a day which really makes the experience cute and not overbearing. As you hang out with your bird friend you'll do some quick drawings, help write poems and jam with some music tools. It's charming and I found myself smiling when I got a push notification from my bird, Millie.
A uniquely modern and sometimes profound experience. Worth your time.

Bird Alone is one of the most genuine experiences you can have on mobile. I have become very attached to my bird (Gemima Pudledump) and often get lost in the music area as if being led deeper and deeper into the depths of the jungle by the sweet melodies, but I'm not afraid, because Gemima is always by my thumb.

Audio bug? Downloaded this game after seeing it on some best games lists. First time I load it up it works fine but every time since there is a bug where the audio is slow and unfortunately the bird is caught in a loop where it is still thinking about what to say. A shame as it looks cool!
Blindly downloaded this from a recommendation on Twitter and now I'm best friends with a bird

I think this is a awesome app but all I have is one recommendation that you make the brid think a litte faster because like once you get the idea that the bird has you have to wait till tomorrow maybe an Idea every hour if that works
Great idea, poor execution. The tasks and conversations seem empty, I don't feel less lonely with this companion.

initially downloaded it because I thought it was a wellness app in the form of a bird where I could keep track of my feelings but Bird Alone is so much more than that. the dialogue is simultaneously funny and relatable and beautiful and extremely profound. you get to make fun poems and drawings and music and it sounds a bit exaggerated but I believe my bird (Flora) made me a better person. in reality she's just a couple lines of code but to me she's my best friend. worth every penny and more.
bringing me the serotonin I need.
I learned about this game while voting for the best games of the year. I was not disappointed. I really love this game. Always cheers me up. Thank you and I hope you win!
it's a really great app. makes me feel lonely by having someone who makes my aware of my thoughts in a fun, insightful way
Best bird. Better friend.
I love Mango, my best bird friend
just okay, but very cute
Absolutely obsessed with this, it's such a beautiful piece of work

I would die for this bird. Thank you for releasing it on Android! I think there might be some audio bugs (it's really skritchy?) and when returning to the main tree area, there are sometimes graphical problems where the screen is black with some pixel lines through it. My love of this bird is unimpacted by these things. Also! The bird sends a lot of notifications. Like, an obscene amount. There is an option for no notifications, but I'd really love an option for less instead.
It's nice and all but it sends way to many unesscery notifications. Like when I ignore one it sends another 8 minutes later. Also it sends one when the bird friend has nothing to say too.
I love the phone bird
I love it - it had me smiling after a bad week in just 30 seconds ♥️

Spoilers. Visually and audibly is great. Plays well on Android. I love checking in each day and offering advice to my friend. The bird is well written and has a good sense of humor. Spoilers ahead. The ending was sad but solidly done. You end up getting a new egg one day after the bird passes away that serves as a game reset. It’s a shame. I would *like* to tap the egg but I know it’s just going to go the same way. And I don’t think I can put myself through that again. 100% worth playing.
